Module atu.aicme4j
Package jhealy.aicme4j

Interface NetworkBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultNetworkBuilder
public interface NetworkBuilder
An interface that describes a fluent builder contract for constructing a neural network. At a minimum a neural network builder must be configured with the following:
  • An input layer
  • One or more hidden layers
  • An output layer
  • The hyperparameters for training the neural network
Calling the build method without providing a basic configuration will result in an exception being thrown.
Since:
Aicme4j 1.0
Author:
Dr. John Healy, ATU.

  • Method Details

    • inputLayer

      NetworkBuilder inputLayer(String name, int size)
      Returns an instance of NetworkBuilder with a configured input layer.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the layer. This is useful for debugging the network
      size - the number of nodes in the input layer. This is the same as the number of features in the training set.
      Returns:
      an instance of NetworkBuilder with a configured input layer

    • hiddenLayer

      NetworkBuilder hiddenLayer(String name, Activation activation, LayerSize size)
      Returns an instance of NetworkBuilder with a configured hidden layer. Multiple hidden layers can be used if required but will exponentially increase the computational complexity of the supervised training.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the layer. This is useful for debugging the network
      activation - the activation function to be used for all nodes in the layer
      size - the heuristic to use to compute the number of nodes in the layer
      Returns:
      an instance of NetworkBuilder with a configured hidden layer

    • hiddenLayer

      NetworkBuilder hiddenLayer(String name, Activation activation, int size)
      Returns an instance of NetworkBuilder with a configured hidden layer.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the layer. This is useful for debugging the network
      activation - the activation function to be used for all nodes in the layer
      size - the number of nodes in the layer
      Returns:
      an instance of NetworkBuilder with a configured hidden layer

    • outputLayer

      NetworkBuilder outputLayer(String name, Activation activation, int size)
      Returns an instance of NetworkBuilder with a configured output layer
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the layer. This is useful for debugging the network
      activation - the activation function to be used for all nodes in the layer
      size - the number of nodes in the input layer. This corresponds to the number of categories for labelled data or a single node for regression.
      Returns:
      an instance of NetworkBuilder with a output hidden layer

    • train

      NetworkBuilder train(double[][] data, double[][] desired, double alpha, double momentum, int epochs, double maxError, Loss loss)
      Returns an instance of NetworkBuilder that has been trained with a backpropagation training algorithm.
      Parameters:
      data - the data set to use for the supervised training
      desired - the expected output for each row in the training set
      alpha - the learning rate of the training algorithm
      momentum - a hyperparameter to help control the rate of gradient descent
      epochs - the maximum number of epochs used in the training
      maxError - the maximum error of the training
      loss - the loss function to use in the training
      Returns:
      a trained instance of NetworkBuilder

    • save

      NetworkBuilder save(String file) throws Exception
      Saves the instance of NeuralNetwork to the specified file after it has been constructed and trained. The saved model can be unmarshalled using Aicme4jUtils.
      Parameters:
      file - the file name
      Returns:
      a trained instance of NetworkBuilder that has been saved to the specified file
      Throws:
      Exception - if the instance of NeuralNetwork cannot be saved to the file

    • build

      NeuralNetwork build() throws Exception
      Returns an instance of a neural network constructed and trained using the other methods of this interface.
      Returns:
      a configured and trained neural network
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if a basic configuration has not been specified
